basics.name: Tam Nguyen
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2022.

courses: ICS 311 - Algorithms: Analyze codes in performance with hardware and real time factors
ICS 101 - Digital Tools for Info World: Basic understanding of computer application functionality. (Microsoft Word, Excel, Powerpoint, etc). (HTML/CSS)
ICS 110M - Introduction to Programming: Basic understanding of coding.
ICS 111 - Intro to Computer Science I: Beginner understanding of coding structure. (Java)
ICS 125 - Personal Comp Maint and Repair: Basic understanding of desktop hardware and internal components.
ICS 129 - Introduction to Databases: Beginner understanding of databases (SQL).
ICS 141 - Discrete Math for Comp Sci I: Beginner understanding of math in a logical sense.
ICS 170 - Ethics for Digital World: Philosophy of a computer scientist.
ICS 184 - Introduction to Networking: Beginner understanding of network structure.
ICS 211 - Intro to Computer Science II: Continuation of ICS 111. Enhanced understanding of data structure and object-oriented programming.
ICS 212 - Program Structure: Almost continuation of ICS 211. Enhanced understanding of program organization, Linux programming enviroment. (C/C++)
ICS 241 - Discrete Math for Comp Sci II: Continuation of ICS 141.

highlights: Usual Night Shift (Closing, cleaning and prepping for the next day)
Efficient communication with crew members to provide service for customers
Assist customers with orders and handling transaction
Answer phone calls and provide assistance as well as creating reservation

work.summary: Picking up passengers and dropping them off at their desired location
highlights: Known for excellent  service and enjoyable conversation
Dedicated atleast 30 hours of work weekly
